Class MinecraftLauncherBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.backend.MinecraftLauncherBackend

extends java.lang.Object
    This is multi-purpose class that simplifies access to many mclauncher-api components

      • getVersionList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getVersionList()
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns:
        List of versions that can be installed
        Throws:

      • updateMinecraft

        public void updateMinecraft(java.lang.String versionID,
                            IProgressMonitor progress)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if local minecraft copy needs updating. Everything is checked - libraries, assets, game jar This should be run everytime before you launch.
        Parameters:
        versionID - - ID of version to check for update.
        progress - - IProgressMonitor in case you want to track the update progress. It may be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Network errors, JSON parsing

      • launchMinecraft

        public java.lang.ProcessBuilder launchMinecraft(ISession session,
                                                java.lang.String versionID)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a ProcessBuilder which has minecraft command inside of it. Use ProcessBuilder.start() to start the process.
        Parameters:
        session - - Authentication session
        versionID - - Version ID to run
        Returns:
        ProcessBuilder which has minecraft command inside of it. No other things are setup.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Network errors, JSON parsing, process failures

      • launchMinecraft

        public java.lang.ProcessBuilder launchMinecraft(ISession session,
                                                ServerInfo serverInfo,
                                                java.lang.String versionID,
                                                ILaunchSettings launchSettings,
                                                IModdingProfile moddingProfile)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a ProcessBuilder which has minecraft command inside of it. Use ProcessBuilder.start() to start the process.
        Parameters:
        session - - Authentication session
        serverInfo - - Server to connect to. May be null.
        versionID - - Version ID to run
        launchSettings - - Launch settings(amount of RAM etc)
        moddingProfile - - Modding profile information(overriding game jar etc.). May be null.
        Returns:
        ProcessBuilder which has minecraft command inside of it. No other things are setup.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Network errors, JSON parsing, process failures
